advancements.definecraftmod.title: Define Craft Mod
advancements.definecraftmod.descr: welcome to defineCraft, if you progress throught the mod you will see that some tools or armor will be pre-enchanted
advancements.definecraftenchant.title: Define Craft Enchantmets
advancements.definecraftenchant.descr: here is some info on the enchantments that have been added.
advancements.enchantment.liquidwalkerenc: this will change all liquids into obsidian that will melt over time.
advancements.enchantment.lightbringerenc: this will spawn a light when you are in a dark place that will vanish after a period time.
advancements.enchantment.flightenchant.d: this will remove fall damage and allow you to fly as if you are in creative mode.
this will make you unable to drawn and burn. if you get damaged down to half of your hearts, you get strength and regen.
advancements.ores.oresilver.title: What is silver ore?
advancements.ores.oresilver.descr: mine a block of silver ore, you can do this with stone or better
advancements.ores.oreterbium.title: What is terbium ore?
advancements.ores.oreterbium.descr: mine a block of terbium ore, you can do this with iron or better
advancements.ores.obsidainore.title: Obsidain tools?
advancements.ores.obsidainore.descr: I really should try to smelt or grind this up to see what happens
advancements.ores.oreshellstone.title: What is this hellstone ore?
advancements.ores.oreshellstone.descr: mine a block of hellstone ore, you can do this with obsidian or better
advancements.ingots.ingotsilver.title: What is silver?
advancements.ingots.ingotsilver.descr: silver makes tools with more durability then iron but is still iron
advancements.ingots.ingotterbium.title: What is terbium?
advancements.ingots.ingotterbium.descr: terbium makes tools with more durability then silver and acts like diamond
advancements.ingots.ingotobsidian.title: What is obsidian?
advancements.ingots.ingotobsidian.descr: obsidian makes tools with more durability then diamond and but with a higher mining level
advancements.ingots.ingothellstone.title: What is hellstone?
advancements.ingots.ingothellstone.descr: Hellstone makes tools with more durability then obsidian and but with a higher mining level
advancements.ingots.hellspawnlevel.title: I must make this
advancements.ingots.hellspawnlevel.descr: you will not get this in world, you have to craft it.
advancements.items.gettinggrinder.title: Ore Doubling?
advancements.items.gettinggrinder.descr: It's not so hard to get more out of your ores, just one crafting step away
advancements.items.gettingdust.title: well its dust now?
advancements.items.gettingdust.descr: you used your grinder head, now that you got more out of you ore smelt it up
advancements.items.hellspawnarmor.title: Hell Spawn? am I okay
advancements.items.hellspawnarmor.descr: this is a little over powered but hard to make, you will never by the same.
advancements.items.hellspawntools.title: Hell Spawn tool info
advancements.items.hellspawntools.descr: this is better the hellstone in every way
